analyticsPageHints.hint:
This is the Cycle Metric Tab

It shows the analytics of cycles over time for a given center.

The Program Feedback Tab
It shows Net Promoter Score (NPS) analytics on VOF’s usability and the learners' experiences of the program.

takeThisTourAgainHint.hint:
You can take the tour again by clicking on this icon
See you later!

analyticsTableSteps.intro:
Welcome To The Analytics Page

This page holds VOF programs analytics such as cycle center. Click the button to continue the tour

The program metrics tab

Under this, you will find all analytics related to a program.
Use this to set the start date of the analytics.
Use this to set the end date of the analytics.
This shows the number of cycles taken per center.
This chart shows the historical numbers and percentages of learners by center and gender
This chart shows the historical data of LFA to Learner ratio across Week 1 and Week 2
This chart shows the historical average perceived readiness of learners for bootcamp by centers.
This chart shows the historical average perceived readiness of learners for bootcamp across genders.
This shows an aggregate program outcome metric for the 1st week.
This shows an aggregate program outcome metric for the 2nd week.
This shows the learners distribution across different centers.
You can use this to export the program metrics data as a PDF, an image or CSV format.

Look Out! This is a hint

Look out for them. Click on them to get more information about certain parts of the page

cycleMetricsSteps.intro: Use this to select the center for which you want to see the cycles analytics.
This shows the performance quality for different bootcamp cycles in the selected center.
This is used to display the output quality for different bootcamp cycles in the selected centers.
This shows the distribution of different learners across different cycles in the selected centers.
Use this to select the cycles for which you want to see analytics.
This shows the 1st week’s outcome distribution for the selected cycle.
This shows the 2nd week’s outcome distribution for the selected cycle.
This chart shows the historical data of LFA to Learner ratio across Week 1 and Week 2 for the selected cycle.
This shows the gender distribution in the selected cycle.

programFeedbackSteps.intro: You can use this to select the center for which you want to see the feedback.
You can use this to select the cycle of the center for which you want to see the feedback.
This pie-chart shows the VOF Usability NPS for the selected center & cycle.
This pie-chart shows the Program NPS for the selected center & cycle.
